text: What I learnt from my parents is that buy when cheap

Mean time staying his parent place

For own stay  suggest go for better contractor.. as for investment  no comment🤣

Hdb is public hsein end of day. 1% increase in hdb n private  amount diff is huge. Sg only around over 300k private property. Which only foreigners n pr can buy due to some regulations on purchasing of hdb by pr  foreigners.. but tis round  resale private property saw alot of hdb upgrades snapping ip esp in Ocr
